_sText:
Me and Razer made a surf map together a long time ago that we never got to finish
Just some short facts:

Surf type: Linear
Jail: Yes
Indoors/Outdoors: Indoors
Theme: Ancient / Temple
Special things: At top jail (when you finish the whole map)
A grenade that respawns on you after throwing
A fly deagle for knife fights (If someone wants to knifefight someone in Jail 1 he can fly down and knife him and when hes done he can fly back up)
If you want a no jail version for timer servers of this map you can pm me/contact me on steam: pimp__juice

Thanks!
